dcterms:creator: Jason Weston
Antoine Bordes
Sumit Chopra
Tomas Mikolov
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset for episodic question answering, consisting of 20 tasks with a small vocabulary that can be solved by remembering a person or an object.
dcterms:title: bAbI

dcterms:creator: Mandar Joshi
Eunsol Choi
Daniel S. Weld
Luke Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: A realistic text-based question answering dataset that includes 950K question-answer pairs from 662K documents collected from Wikipedia and the web.
dcterms:title: TriviaQA

dcterms:creator: Jie Lei
Licheng Yu
Mohit Bansal
Tamara L. Berg
dcterms:description: A localized, compositional video question answering dataset that contains 153K question-answer pairs from 22K clips spanning over 460 hours of video.
dcterms:title: TVQA

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing over 100,000 questions for machine comprehension of text, requiring the prediction of exact locations of answers.
dcterms:title: Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD)
